grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 溺愛【デキアイ】infatuation, adoration, blind love, doting (on a child)
惑溺【ワクデキ】being addicted or given over to
沈溺【チンデキ】being immersed in water, being drowned, being infatuated, being dazed, being blinded by
kun reading compounds: 溺れる【おぼれる】to drown, to nearly drown, to sink below the surface (of water), to indulge in, to lose one's head over something, to wallow in
おぼれる者はわらをもつかむ【おぼれるものはわらをもつかむ】a drowning man will catch at a straw
